column1: Noor is making coffee at a busy shop. Noor wants to make a yummy coffee with oat milk for a person. Noor picks a milk jar and puts oat milk in it. Noor thinks the milk jar has oat milk. Noor wants to make coffee with almond milk. A pretty cup falls from a shelf.

Zara is attending an art exhibition at a local gallery in her town. Zara wants to learn more about a particular abstract painting she admires. The label next to the artwork states that the painting is the work of a famous artist
column2: and Zara reads the label carefully. Zara believes that the painting is the work of a famous artist. A gallery visitor accidentally spills a glass of water near the painting. Zara observes the water spill.

column1: Carlos is a farmer in a little place
column2: watching his corn field. He wants to give water to his plants by opening a water door connected to a river nearby. Carlos closed the water door last night. Carlos thinks the water door is closed now. A group of big birds comes to the corn field. Carlos sees the big birds in his field.

column1: Harry is in his home on a cold day. Harry wants to make his home warm with a fire in the fireplace. Harry sees the fireplace is full of wood ready for a fire. Harry thinks the fireplace is ready to make a fire. A bird flies into Harry's window. Harry sees the bird fly into the window.

Emily is on a popular island for a fun day. Emily wants to tie her boat to a big tree near the beach. Emily sees the tree is strong and big. Emily thinks the tree is strong enough to tie her boat to. A big fish jumps out of the water near Emily's boat. Emily sees the big fish jumping.

Lisa is at a big party with her friends. Lisa wants to play a song on her violin for her friends. Lisa's violin is in a clean and shiny case. Lisa thinks her violin is clean and ready to play. A clown comes to the party and starts to make balloon animals. Lisa sees the clown making balloon animals.

Billy is playing in his room with his toy cars. Billy wants to play a game where his toy gun is the start line for the cars. Billy's toy gun is standing up straight on the floor. Billy believes his toy gun is standing up and ready. Billy's mom calls him for lunch. Billy hears his mom calling him for lunch.

Gina is in her garden with her white ball. Gina wants to play catch with her dog. Gina's ball is clean and white. Gina thinks the ball is clean and ready to play. A butterfly lands on Gina's hand. Gina sees the butterfly on her hand.
Dino is at a big party with his friends. Dino wants to share a big
column2: thin cake with his friends. The cake is on a high table. Dino thinks the cake is on the high table. A big balloon pops and makes a loud noise. Dino hears the big balloon pop.

column1: Wanda is in her room with her big book. Wanda wants to put a pretty stamp on a page to mark her favorite story. Wanda's stamp is new and sticky. Wanda thinks the stamp is ready to be used. Wanda's cat jumps onto her bed. Wanda sees her cat jump onto the bed.

Felix is at a big car race. Felix wants to unlock his race car and start the motor to join the race. Felix sees that his car keys are in his pocket. Felix believes that his car keys are in his pocket. A graceful bird lands on the fence near the race track. Felix sees the bird land on the fence.

Violet is in a beautiful garden full of flowers. Violet wants to take a picture of a big red rose. The rose is in full bloom and it looks very pretty. Violet believes that the rose is in full bloom. A butterfly lands on a nearby sunflower. Violet sees the butterfly land on the sunflower.

Kyle is in the park with his red kite. Kyle wants to fly his kite in the sky. Kyle sees that his kite is dry and ready to fly. Kyle believes his kite is dry and ready to fly. A little bird lands on a tree near Kyle. Kyle sees the bird land on the tree.

Alice is at a fun park with her red ball. Alice wants to play catch with her friends using her red ball. Alice sees that her red ball is in her bag. Alice believes that her red ball is in her bag. A merry-go-round starts to play a happy song. Alice hears the merry-go-round song.

column2: building a big sand castle. Oliver wants to make the tallest sand castle that he can. Oliver's sand castle is very tall and strong. Oliver believes that his sand castle is the tallest and strongest. A seagull lands near Oliver's sand castle spot. Oliver sees the seagull.
